title: The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword (Zero Punctuation Re-Release)
description:
The Zero Punctuation episode of The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword was never officially released by The Escapist on YouTube in a standalone format. Now it has. Enjoy.
